thread.title: Antoine Griezmann receives HUGE birthday cake from France squad as Manchester United target turns 26
thread.title_full: Antoine Griezmann receives HUGE birthday cake from France squad as Manchester United target turns 26

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Antoine Griezmann receives HUGE birthday cake from France squad as Manchester United target turns 26
text:
Sport Antoine Griezmann receives HUGE birthday cake from France squad as Manchester United target turns 26 France face Luxembourg on Saturday in a 2018 World Cup qualifier before playing against Spain in a friendly Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Antoine Griezmann presented with birthday cake Share this video Get Manchester United FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
France gifted Antoine Griezmann with an enormous birthday cake on Tuesday as their star striker turned 26. 
The Atletico Madrid forward is away on international duty over the next two weeks and has linked up with the likes of Dimitri Payet, Hugo Lloris and Kylian Mbappe. 
The Euro 2016 runners-up face Luxembourg on Saturday in a 2018 World Cup qualifier before playing against Spain next week in a friendly. 
And L'Equipe de France will be relying heavily on the man who scored six goals during last summer's tournament. Is Antoine's wish a summer move? (Photo: equipedefrance / Instagram) 
So it's no surprise to see France try and keep him sweet with a huge birthday cake. Griezmann received his flaming surprise to a chorus of 'Bon Anniversaire' from his teammates. 
After receiving his gift, the birthday boy said: "It's really an honour for me to share this cake with you." (Photo: equipedefrance / Instagram) 
Griezmann is one of Europe's hottest strikers at the moment and has scored more than 20 goals in all competitions in each of his last four seasons. 
This kind of form has naturally caught the attention of some of the biggest clubs in the world. Manchester United have been heavily linked of late. poll loading Will Griezmann play for Manchester United next season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
